defaultMessage: Share with friends and family (especially if they live near the coast!)

There are many ways to share. Of course, there is {facebook} and {twitter}. If you are the next generation you might prefer {whatsapp} or some other programm I don't know about because I'm too old or not familiar with the platforms you use in your country.
But we all know how social media works. If you really want to reach someone, talking to that person still is the most effective.
